mapper.update: update mkt_strategy_conf set MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_NAME = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID = #{mktStrategyConfId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID, MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_NAME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_strategy_conf where MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID = #{mktStrategyConfId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID, MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_NAME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_strategy_conf
